isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 26-SI SERIES - REPAIR PROCEDURES - REGULATOR REPLACEMENT

svcproc.title: REGULATOR REPLACEMENT
svcproc.para: If alternator component checks previously outlined indicate that the regulator is faulty, replace the regulator. Refer to Alternator Has No Voltage Output to verify regulator replacement is necessary.
After disconnecting the three identically colored regulator leads, the regulator may be replaced by removing the attaching screws and disconnecting the regulator lead from the heat sink.

note.para: Before replacing the regulator, the back of the regulator mounting plate and back (metal side) of regulator must be coated with silicone dielectric grease to assure good heat transfer. Use Delco Remy 1974984 grease or equivalent.
